mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT mr.manager_id FROM cms_role_resource rr LEFT JOIN cms_manager_role mr ON rr.role_id = mr.role_id WHERE rr.resource_id=#{resourceId}

SELECT ur.resource_id ResourceId, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.resource_category_id ResourceCategoryId FROM cms_manager_role mr LEFT JOIN cms_role r ON mr.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN cms_role_resource rr ON r.role_id = rr.role_id LEFT JOIN cms_resource ur ON ur.resource_id = rr.resource_id WHERE mr.manager_id = #{managerId} AND ur.resource_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.resource_id
